questions.question: What is a component in React?
options: A function that returns React elements
questions.correctAnswer: A function that returns React elements

questions.question: What is state in React?
options: An object that stores component data
questions.correctAnswer: An object that stores component data

questions.question: What is the purpose of componentDidMount() lifecycle method?
options: To perform actions after a component is rendered
questions.correctAnswer: To perform actions after a component is rendered

questions.question: What is a functional component in React?
options: A component written with ES5 syntax
A component that uses class syntax
A component that is defined as a JavaScript function
A component that has no state
questions.correctAnswer: A component that is defined as a JavaScript function

questions.question: What is the purpose of props in React?
options: To pass data from a parent component to a child component
questions.correctAnswer: To pass data from a parent component to a child component
